verses.name: Mark 9:1
verses.text: And he said unto them, Verily I say unto you, That there be some of them that stand here, which shall not taste of death, till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power.

verses.name: Mark 9:2
verses.text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter, and James, and John, and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves: and he was transfigured before them.

verses.name: Mark 9:3
verses.text: And his raiment became shining, exceeding white as snow; so as no fuller on earth can white them.

verses.name: Mark 9:4
verses.text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses: and they were talking with Jesus.
